content.en: CAD algorithms: Algorithms play a crucial role in various aspects of computer-aided design (CAD) and manufacturing processes. They are used for automated feature recognition, shape comparison, topology generation, and more. These algorithms help improve accuracy and efficiency in tasks such as 3D part search, reverse engineering, and manufacturing applications.
content.da: CAD-algoritmer: Algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i forskellige aspekter af computerstøttet design (CAD) og fremstillingsprocesser. De bruges til automatisk funktionsgenkendelse, form sammenligning, topologi generering og mere. Disse algoritmer hjælper med at forbedre nøjagtighed og effektivitet i opgaver som 3D-delekspedition, reverse engineering og fremstillingsapplikationer.
